metadata.title: CVE-2020-21913 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS-preview 22.04 LTS (jammy) - low
metadata.description:
International Components for Unicode (ICU-20850) v66.1 was discovered tocontain a use after free bug in the pkg_createWithAssemblyCode function inthe file tools/pkgdata/pkgdata.cpp.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-21913` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libicu67 - 67.1-7ubuntu1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: icu package in jammy, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '67.1-7ubuntu1').
